+0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5f524eac7ed0ee001e25d814?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"f09994cc6327b63345ee6189ba1d54fa","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn80@2020_4/2020/09/04/16-37-34-341_7c0904fc3a613e0e.webp","destWidth":4032,"destHeight":3024,"sourceBytes":689624,"destBytes":689624,"author":"leadicicco@businessinsider.com (Lisa Eadicicco)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f524ccbe6ff30001d4e716a?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn39@2020_1/2020/09/04/16-37-45-440_c6c49fe6e8ecf039.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f524cf07ed0ee001e25d805?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx14/cdn88@2020_2/2020/09/04/16-37-53-863_2a6bb1c5bf962a80.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f524d157ed0ee001e25d808?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn68@2020_2/2020/09/04/16-38-07-086_27c68fe671881001.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f524d757ed0ee001e25d80a?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn12@2020_6/2020/09/04/16-37-50-073_89393f30711610b0.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f524dd87ed0ee001e25d80e?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn11@2020_4/2020/09/04/16-37-54-275_41d1a58a777927c4.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f524e9ae6ff30001d4e717c?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn76@2020_2/2020/09/04/16-37-48-538_ec98f579a1cb7bb7.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f524e3ee6ff30001d4e717a?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn39@2020_3/2020/09/04/16-38-07-534_756df6e9988afcf0.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn3@2020_1/2020/09/04/16-38-03-978_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=qonIUPA2ywY:Lr6G-5MgC6M:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn35@2020_1/2020/09/04/16-38-03-360_eade1f757d3bb545.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=qonIUPA2ywY:Lr6G-5MgC6M:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn24@2020_6/2020/09/04/16-38-03-999_a877406936aef425.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn24@2020_6/2020/09/04/16-37-59-085_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=qonIUPA2ywY:Lr6G-5MgC6M:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn47@2020_4/2020/09/04/16-38-00-154_c509dcf3d1a65f1c.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/qonIUPA2ywY":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn74@2020_6/2020/09/04/16-38-05-159_263960a857a71c05.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1599237433647},{"createdTime":"2020-09-05 00:37:13","updatedTime":"2020-09-05 00:37:13","title":"The US is facing a meat shortage, but you can still buy beef, pork, poultry and more at these online retailers","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/where-to-buy-meat-online","description":"<p class=\"financial-disclaimer\"><i>When you buy through our links, we may earn money from our affiliate partners. <a href=\"https://www.insider-inc.com/commerce-on-insider-inc/\">Learn more.</a></i></p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5d3b73b0a13c9515e10153f4?format=jpeg\" alt=\"rastellis meat and fish delivery 4\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Rastelli&#39;s</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li>It might be tough to find meat right now — everyone from small local butcher shops to Costco and web-based direct-to-consumer purveyors is in short supply — but it's not impossible to track down and there's no reason to panic.</li><li>Below are the places where we've had recent success, and we'll continue to update this running list as we see fit.</li><li>Some brands may have difficulty keeping up with demands. In light of this, we'll note any delays of which we're aware.</li><li>Read more: <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-online-grocery-store\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">The best places to buy groceries online</a></li></ul><p>Production is picking up the pace after grinding to a near halt amidst the early weeks of the pandemic, but it can still be tricky to find what you're after both locally <em>and </em>online, especially when it comes to beef and pork. Suffice it to say that Covid-19 has revealed more than a few flaws in the greater meat system.</p><p>According to a Stephens analyst, roughly <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/wendys-locations-are-running-out-of-burgers-beef-shortages-2020-5\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">one in five Wendy's restaurants was out of hamburger meat</a> back in early May. And in April, pork processor Smithfield Foods, which is reportedly responsible for about four to five percent of US pork production, shut its Sioux Falls, South Dakota facility indefinitely, according to a company <a href=\"https://www.smithfieldfoods.com/press-room/company-news/smithfield-foods-to-close-sioux-falls-sd-plant-indefinitely-amid-covid-19\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">press release</a>.</p><p>The head of the department of agriculture at Purdue University says beef and pork production capacity is <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/production-shutdowns-shrink-meat-supplies-at-stores-2020-5\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">down 40% from last year</a>, and Tyson, the world's second-largest supplier of poultry, beef, and pork, ran a full-page ad in the New York Times stating that \"the food supply chain is broken.\" In August, the supplier reported a 22% decline from last year.</p><p>It is an <a href=\"https://amzn.to/36nzTL7\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Omnivore's Dilemma</a> to boot, and while it's true that meat supplies are dwindling, all of the above isn't necessarily cause for panic.</p><p>While your local superstore or butcher might not have their full menu available right now, plants have opened back up and production is on the rise, but risks still abound, especially at larger processing facilities, <a href=\"https://www.politico.com/news/2020/06/02/meatpacking-plants-reopen-coronavirus-294382\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Politico reports</a>. We're here to point you towards the online retailers and subscription services we've had success with recently ourselves.</p>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tGeneral meat purveyors\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5c3625a1bd773059b76fb606?format=jpeg\" alt=\"snake river farms review 4\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Snake River Farms</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<ul><li><strong><strong><a href=\"https://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=82639&#38;urllink=www.farmfoodsmarket.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">FarmFoods Market</a>: </strong></strong>Farmfoods offers your everyday cuts of beef and pork like anywhere else, sure, but what you don't get elsewhere is a carefully selected co-op of 14 farms and seafood outfits to fit the job. We sampled a wide range of seafood and meat from around the world, and, sure enough, everything came immaculately vacuum-sealed. We received a filet of wild Alaskan sockeye salmon from Wild Alaska Salmon and Seafood, a rack of free-range New Zealand lamb from Ovation, a pheasant-based cognac sausage from Chateau Royal, a pork chop from Redtop Farms, an Ossobucco from Fantasma's Finest, and, well, you get the idea. Everything comes from a farm or fishing outfit that specializes in doing a few things just right. There's also free shipping when you order over 10 pounds.</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.pursuitfarms.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Pursuit Farms</a>:&#160;</strong>If you're looking to go all-out for the best of the best Wagyu beef you can get your mitts on right here in the US of A, Pursuit Farms sells it in both small packages and in bulk. You'll pay a lot for meat of this quality, though maybe not as much as you'd expect, and it is, after all, the best beef we've sampled yet. What's more is that there's flat rate shipping (two-day, air) regardless of how much you order.</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=78457&#38;urllink=www.butcherbox.com%2F&#38;afftrack=1588784422199aty1yge2y|xid:fr1588784426076ejb\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"60\" data-ml-dynamic=\"true\" data-ml-dynamic-type=\"sl\" data-orig-url=\"https://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=78457&#38;urllink=www.butcherbox.com%2F&#38;afftrack=1588784422199aty1yge2y\" data-ml-id=\"20\" data-ml=\"true\" data-xid=\"fr1588784426076ejb\">ButcherBox</a>:&#160;</strong>While most meat subscription services offer pre-existing bundles, ButcherBox lets you curate and build a box yourself. Heads up, though: At the time of this writing, there's a waitlist to join.</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=80197&#38;urllink=porterroad.com%2F%3Futm_campaign%3D1008770550%26utm_source%3Dgoogle%26utm_medium%3Dcpc%26utm_content%3Dbrand%26utm_term%3Dporter%2520road%26adgroupid%3D49159576305%26gclid%3DEAIaIQobChMImN37jsz36AIVBLbICh1tUgHdEAAYASAAEgIqePD_BwE&#38;afftrack=1588784422199asvp7it1c|xid:fr1588784426076dfe\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"60\" data-ml-dynamic=\"true\" data-ml-dynamic-type=\"sl\" data-orig-url=\"https://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=80197&#38;urllink=porterroad.com%2F%3Futm_campaign%3D1008770550%26utm_source%3Dgoogle%26utm_medium%3Dcpc%26utm_content%3Dbrand%26utm_term%3Dporter%2520road%26adgroupid%3D49159576305%26gclid%3DEAIaIQobChMImN37jsz36AIVBLbICh1tUgHdEAAYASAAEgIqePD_BwE&#38;afftrack=1588784422199asvp7it1c\" data-ml-id=\"16\" data-ml=\"true\" data-xid=\"fr1588784426076dfe\">Porter Road</a>: </strong>Porter Road has all the basic meats, but while the steaks are great, we're huge fans of the sausages and bacon. The brand hasn't announced any delays and plans on restocking regularly.</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=999&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=51308&#38;urllink=www.snakeriverfarms.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"60\" data-ml-dynamic=\"true\" data-ml-dynamic-type=\"sl\" data-orig-url=\"https://www.snakeriverfarms.com/?ne_ppc_id=348118719&#38;gclid=EAIaIQobChMIt_P3kMz36AIVCVYMCh1iyAEYEAAYASAAEgJZ-vD_BwE\" data-ml-id=\"18\" data-ml=\"true\" data-xid=\"fr1588784426076fjg\" data-skimlinks-tracking=\"xid:fr1588784426076fjg\">Snake River Farms</a>:</strong> Snake River Farms offers top-notch, responsibly produced meat, and it's also available in bulk. The brand's US-based Wagyu is an excellent &#8212; and much more affordable &#8212; alternative to Japanese Wagyu.</li><li><a href=\"https://rastellis.eyip.net/c/196318/611447/9984?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.rastellis.com%2F&#38;subid2=1588784422199a0qjk73bu&#38;subId3=xid:fr1588784426076fcc\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"60\" data-orig-url=\"https://rastellis.eyip.net/c/196318/611447/9984?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.rastellis.com%2F&#38;subid2=1588784422199a0qjk73bu\" data-ml-id=\"19\" data-ml=\"true\" data-xid=\"fr1588784426076fcc\"><strong>Rastelli's</strong></a>: This veteran New Jersey outpost sells responsibly-raised meat in single servings and in bulk. Boxes of different bundles and cuts of meat are available, but you can also subscribe to regular shipments with a 5% discount. The company is experiencing delays and expects to deliver items within 7-12 business days.</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&#38;mid=44425&#38;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.goldbelly.com%2Fpat-lafrieda-meat-purveyors\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"60\">LaFrieda Meat Purveyors</a>: </strong>LaFrieda Meat Purveyors sells beef (and veal), pork, poultry, and lamb <a href=\"https://www.lafrieda.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">directly on its own site</a> and on <a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&#38;mid=44425&#38;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.goldbelly.com%2Fpat-lafrieda-meat-purveyors\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Goldbelly</a>. The three-generations-old New Jersey-based vendors are best known for their fresh and dry-aged cuts of USDA Prime Black Angus beef: bone-in rib and strip steaks, tomahawks, and burger patties made from short rib, brisket, and dry-aged beef.</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.grassrootscoop.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"60\">Grass Roots Farmers' Cooperative</a>:</strong> The Grass Roots Farmer's Cooperative provides pasture-raised beef, pork, and poultry from a cooperative of families producing small batches of some of the highest-quality animal protein you can get your hands on.</li><li><a href=\"https://www.flannerybeef.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\"><strong>Flannery Beef</strong></a><strong>:</strong>&#160;Selling California Reserve and Midwestern (USDA) beef along with lamb and pork at very reasonable prices, Flannery offers affordable but flavorful cuts of beef. Our favorite is the <a href=\"https://www.flannerybeef.com/hanger-steak.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Midwestern Hanger steak</a>. That said, if you're looking to buy organic, free-range beef from small co-ops who can tell you the name of the animal you'll be dining on &#8212;&#160; which, yes, comes at a cost &#8212; look elsewhere.</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://thrivemarket.com/myaisle/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Thrive Market</a>:</strong> Thrive Market is a subscription-based online superstore of sorts, selling certain things, like meat and seafood, in bulk. You won't necessarily find the most outstanding quality on everything, but it is very well packaged and sourced on the more sustainable side.</li><li><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://grasslandbeef.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"><strong>US Wellness Meats</strong></a><strong>:</strong> US Wellness offers all of your basic French cuts of beef, but all of the brand's cattle are 100% (non-GMO) grass-fed and grass-finished, as well as antibiotic- and hormone-free. The most exciting thing about US Wellness Meats' offerings, though, is the selection of bulk-size \"primal cuts,\" which range from around three to 15 pounds, and allow you to portion and cut your own steaks, sandwich meat, ribs, and more. We can also vouch for the brand's lamb. Delivery has been on the slower side lately, with orders arriving about 10 days after they're placed.</li><li><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.mychicagosteak.com/\"><strong>Chicago Steak Company</strong></a>: If you don't require grass-fed-and-finished, hormone-and-antibiotic-free beef, Chicago Steak Company offers certified USDA Prime or upper-1/3 USDA Choice beef, which as far as flavor goes, can hardly be beat. If you want to step it up a bit, consider the American Wagyu, which isn't <em>quite</em> like the Japanese Wagyu, but is noticeably more marbly than USDA. The assortments are generally the best deals on the site: look to the <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.mychicagosteak.com/best-selling-steak-assortments/chicago-s-best-seller-assrt108.html\">Chicago's Best Seller</a>, which comes with two filets, two strips, two sirloins, and two ribeyes. Be sure to check for special offers and promo codes &#8212; right now you can buy six petite New York strip steaks with any order over $129.</li></ul>\n\tSpecialized meat purveyors\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5d94cc0c4f9e7309f37a501d?format=jpeg\" alt=\"crowd cow 4\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Crowd Cow/Instagram</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<ul><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.crowdcow.com/?sscid=41k4_go4x2&#38;utm_source=shareasale&#38;utm_medium=affiliates&#38;utm_campaign=1088116&#38;utm_content=999\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"60\" data-ml-dynamic=\"true\" data-ml-dynamic-type=\"sl\" data-orig-url=\"https://www.crowdcow.com/?sscid=41k4_go4x2&#38;utm_source=shareasale&#38;utm_medium=affiliates&#38;utm_campaign=1088116&#38;utm_content=999\" data-ml-id=\"15\" data-ml=\"true\" data-xid=\"fr1588784426076fai\" data-skimlinks-tracking=\"xid:fr1588784426076fai\">Crowd Cow</a>:&#160;</strong>A subscription-based delivery service known for top-notch cuts of meat from livestock that lived the high life, Crowd Cow offers delicacies like Japanese Wagyu, organic and grass-fed American cattle, and so on. On the brand's site, you'll also find a variety of fresh and smoked fishes, predominantly from fishing cooperatives. Subscriptions start at $99 with free shipping and the company is currently offering a 5% discount on every shipment. Crowd Cow, which ships in plastic-covered biodegradable foam as opposed to styrofoam, hasn't reported any service delays, but did put out <a href=\"https://www.crowdcow.com/covid-19-faq\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">a note on Covid-19</a> stating that its team is working round the clock.</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.gopjn.com/t/S0BLS0NKQERGRklFS0BKSUxMSw?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.dartagnan.com%2Fhome\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">D'Artagnan</a>: </strong>One of the earlier DTC meat distributors, D'Artagnan started out selling foie gras to New York City chefs in 1985, but quickly branched out. Now the company offers game birds, beef, veal, duck (from muscovy and moulard to Rohan duckling), truffles, charcuterie, and plenty more.</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=35871X943606&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fholygrailsteak.com%2F&#38;xcust=1588784422199a4yluze8f|xid:fr1588784426076hei\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"60\" data-orig-url=\"https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=35871X943606&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fholygrailsteak.com%2F&#38;xcust=1588784422199a4yluze8f\" data-ml-id=\"17\" data-ml=\"true\" data-xid=\"fr1588784426076hei\">Holy Grail Steaks</a>:</strong> Very few meat purveyors in the United States offer Japanese Wagyu, but in addition to its US-raised beef, Holy Grail stocks several choice cuts of the rich, marbly stuff (though be aware that it rings in at top dollar).</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&#38;mid=147&#38;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.omahasteaks.com%2Fbuy%2FMeats\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Omaha Steaks</a>:&#160;</strong>If you're after meats from the good old US of A that received top marks from the USDA,&#160;look no further. Bison, ribs, roasts, veal, ham, and bacon; it's all there.</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://meatnbone.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Meat N' Bone</a>:</strong> Based in Florida, Meat N' Bone offers everything from heartland-raised American Wagyu to specialty game and seafood, too. Think wild boar, elk, stone crab claws, hogfish, yellowtail snapper, and gulf shrimp.</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.piedmontese.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Certified Piedmontese</a>:</strong> We haven't tried this one, but if you're looking for low-calorie, low-fat beef, Piedmontese cattle are billed as a \"healthier beef option.\"</li></ul>\n\tMeal kits\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5c5d8e8f85aef5413353a0b8?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Sun Basket 2\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Sun Basket</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Meal kit delivery services come with everything you need to make delicious dishes at home &#8212; including any meat required for a certain recipe. It'll be more expensive overall than buying meat and produce separately, but it's a smart way to ensure you get all of your ingredients at once.</p><ul><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/sid/1588784422199a8ijf9swb%7Cxid:fr1588784426076ggd/https://www.homechef.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-orig-url=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/sid/1588784422199a8ijf9swb/https://www.homechef.com/\" data-ml-id=\"28\" data-ml=\"true\" data-xid=\"fr1588784426076ggd\">Home Chef</a>:&#160;</strong>Fresh, chef-designed meals based on your preferences (like calorie-conscious or vegetarian). Starting at $6.99 per serving.</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://blueapron.i3zp.net/c/196318/151480/2880?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.blueapron.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-ml-dynamic=\"true\" data-ml-dynamic-type=\"sl\" data-orig-url=\"https://www.blueapron.com/?utm_content=0kkUj%3A37Qw8TVcD0AAXT3S5PUki2t3X3gwKp0E0&#38;sharedid=&#38;pid=196318&#38;utm_source=ignite&#38;utm_medium=affiliate&#38;affsrc=1\" data-ml-id=\"29\" data-ml=\"true\" data-xid=\"fr1588784426076eaf\" data-skimlinks-tracking=\"xid:fr1588784426076eaf\">Blue Apron</a>:&#160;</strong>Blue Apron offers well-balanced meals made from responsibly sourced ingredients. Meal kits start at $7.49 per serving.</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&#38;mid=44425&#38;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.goldbelly.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Goldbelly</a>:</strong> Goldbelly facilitates deliveries to all 50 states (when and where possible) so that you can, for example, send <a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&#38;mid=44425&#38;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.goldbelly.com%2Fraouls-restaurant%2Fsteak-au-poivre-kit-4-pack\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Raoul's Steak Au Poivre Kit</a> or a meal kit from <a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&#38;mid=44425&#38;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.goldbelly.com%2Fcote-korean-steakhouse\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Cote Korean Steakhouse</a> to your friends or family anywhere in the greater US. Note that some merchants are experiencing delays on an individual basis.</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fsunbasket.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-ml-dynamic=\"true\" data-ml-dynamic-type=\"sl\" data-orig-url=\"https://sunbasket.com/?utm_source=affiliate&#38;utm_medium=sas&#38;utm_campaign=sasaffiliate&#38;sscid=41k4_p3jh2&#38;spid=1088116&#38;said=719223\" data-ml-id=\"31\" data-ml=\"true\" data-xid=\"fr1588784426076feb\" data-skimlinks-tracking=\"xid:fr1588784426076feb\">Sun Basket</a>:&#160;</strong>Sun Basket offers sustainably-sourced meals, three ways: oven-ready, pre-prepped, and classic (meaning the prepping and cooking is up to you). Starting at $10.99 per serving. Deliveries might be delayed according to this <a href=\"https://sunbasket.com/covid19-faq/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Covid-19 update</a>.</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hellofresh.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-ml-dynamic=\"true\" data-ml-dynamic-type=\"sl\" data-orig-url=\"https://www.hellofresh.com/?utm_source=Business+Insider~cj&#38;utm_medium=cpa&#38;utm_campaign=www.hellofresh.com&#38;utm_id=cj~11557362&#38;cjevent=f15d914c866411ea82f601450a240611\" data-ml-id=\"32\" data-ml=\"true\" data-xid=\"fr1588784426076jdf\" data-skimlinks-tracking=\"xid:fr1588784426076jdf\">HelloFresh</a>:</strong> A box of high-quality, fresh ingredients shipped directly to you from the farm for $7.49 per serving. The brand also offers flexible meal plans so you can skip a week here and there, as well as swap recipes. HelloFresh hasn't reported shortages or slow-downs, but according to <a href=\"https://www.hellofresh.com/about/covid-19-updates#question-en-US-COVID-19-Updates-FAQ-Will-COVID-19-impact-your-food-supply?-0\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">its Covid-19 update</a>, you'll receive an email if there are any issues with your order.&#160;</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fdinnerly.com%2Fhow\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\">Dinnerly</a>:</strong> \"Unfussy and affordable\" weekday meals are what Dinnerly advertises, and that description is spot-on: at $4.49 per serving, it's the most budget-friendly meal plan or kit we've found yet. According to the brand's <a href=\"https://dinnerly.com/blog/covid-19-updates-from-dinnerly-meal-kit-founder-ceo\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">most recent Covid-19 update</a>, your delivery date might shift depending on where you live.</li></ul>\n\tNon-meat meat delivery options\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5d641be12e22af0d053aa0a5?format=jpeg\" alt=\"blue apron beyond meat\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Blue Apron</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>If sustainability is on your mind, you're thinking of transitioning to a more plant-based diet, or members of your household are vegetarian or vegan, you might want to consider signing up for a non-meat meal kit service, too. At the very least, you'll have backup options for dinner if you do run into meat delivery issues at some point.&#160;</p><ul><li><strong><a href=\"https://drpraegers.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Dr. Praeger's Purely Sensible Foods</a>: </strong>This is one of the early birds of vegetarian and vegan prepared foods: Veggie burgers, tenders, patties, etc. Just note: The seafood DOES contain seafood.</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.morningstarfarms.com/en_US/home.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Morningstar Foods</a>:</strong> Another early player in plant-based meat substitutions, Morningstar has long been popular for its black bean burgers. Faux chicken, hot dogs, and veggie takes on meat-heavy appetizers are all on offer.</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.beyondmeat.com/products/?gclid=EAIaIQobChMIqMDf8PLH6QIVCtbACh0mPwp8EAAYASAAEgJGqfD_BwE\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Beyond Meat</a>:&#160;</strong>Beyond meat has done an outstanding job of using plant-based ingredients to replicate beef. The brand also offers vegetarian takes on sausages, breakfast sausages, and ground beef, and you can expect to see more soon. The brand is also donating over one million meals to those in need during the current crisis.</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://blueapron.i3zp.net/c/196318/151480/2880?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.blueapron.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-ml-dynamic=\"true\" data-ml-dynamic-type=\"sl\" data-orig-url=\"https://www.blueapron.com/?utm_content=0kkUj%3A37Qw8TVcD0AAXT3S5PUki2t3X3gwKp0E0&#38;sharedid=&#38;pid=196318&#38;utm_source=ignite&#38;utm_medium=affiliate&#38;affsrc=1\" data-ml-id=\"29\" data-ml=\"true\" data-xid=\"fr1588784426076eaf\" data-skimlinks-tracking=\"xid:fr1588784426076eaf\">Blue Apron</a>:&#160;</strong>Blue Apron also offers vegan and vegetarian meals, including some featuring the Beyond Meat burger. Meal kits start at $7.49 per serving.</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://purple-carrot.wk5q.net/c/196318/541521/9141?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.purplecarrot.com%2F%3Fclickid%3DSNxTrMUzhxyOUzI07OwzdzZ-Uki2t3zmgwKp0E0%26utm_source%3Daffiliate%26utm_campaign%3Daff_196318%26irgwc%3D1&#38;subid2=1588784422199a7pm4xb39&#38;subId3=xid:fr1588784426076ifd\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-orig-url=\"https://purple-carrot.wk5q.net/c/196318/541521/9141?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.purplecarrot.com%2F%3Fclickid%3DSNxTrMUzhxyOUzI07OwzdzZ-Uki2t3zmgwKp0E0%26utm_source%3Daffiliate%26utm_campaign%3Daff_196318%26irgwc%3D1&#38;subid2=1588784422199a7pm4xb39\" data-ml-id=\"30\" data-ml=\"true\" data-xid=\"fr1588784426076ifd\">Purple Carrot</a>:&#160;</strong>Purple Carrot offers healthful, plant-based meal kits starting at about $9.99 per serving. Options include protein-rich and carb-rich dishes. Note that Purple Carrot is <a href=\"https://faq.purplecarrot.com/en/collections/2277674-covid-19\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">currently experiencing some delays</a>.</li></ul>\n\tCheck out related guides\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5eb31d201441921e1b4dda66?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Weber Premium Charcoal Grill\" height=\"750\" width=\"1000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Weber</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"http://www.businessinsider.com/best-charcoal-grill/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"80\">The best charcoal grills</a></h3><p>Charcoal grills sear meat and veggies to perfection and fill food with that perfect smokey flavor. Here are&#160;<a href=\"http://www.businessinsider.com/best-charcoal-grill/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"80\">the best charcoal grills</a>&#160;you can buy.</p><hr /><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-gas-grill\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"80\">The best gas grills you can buy</a></h3><p>The gas grill is the centerpiece of your backyard during summertime barbecues, so you should invest in a great one. Here are our top picks for&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-gas-grill\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"80\">the best gas grills</a>&#160;you can buy.</p><hr /><h3><a href=\"http://www.businessinsider.com/best-charcoal/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"80\">The best charcoals for grilling</a></h3><p>Although you may think that all bags of charcoal are pretty much identical, there are actually many different types and styles to choose from. Here are our top picks for <a href=\"http://www.businessinsider.com/best-charcoal/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"80\">the best grilling charcoal</a>.</p><hr /><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-grilling-tools\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"80\">The best grilling tools</a></h3><p>Nothing compares to food cooked on a grill, and when you have great tools and accessories at your disposal, grilling is just about the easiest kind of cooking, too. These are <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-grilling-tools\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"80\">the best grilling tools</a>&#160;you can buy.</p><hr /><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-cast-iron-skillet\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"80\">The best cast-iron skillets</a></h3><p>Equally at home over an open campfire or on the stovetop of a Michelin-star restaurant, cast iron skillets heat evenly, are naturally non-stick, and will last you a lifetime if properly cared for. These are <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-cast-iron-skillet\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"80\">the best cast-iron skillets</a>.</p><hr /><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-meat-thermometer\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">The best meat thermometers</a></h3><p>If you like to grill or cook meat at home, it's a good idea to have a probe thermometer on hand &#8212; preferably one that's intuitive to use, provides fast and accurate measurements, and is easy to read. These are <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-meat-thermometer\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">the best meat thermometers</a>.</p>\n</div><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original 9@2020_2/2020/09/04/16-37-59-249_a9956456583424e0.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1599237433639},{"createdTime":"2020-09-05 00:37:13","updatedTime":"2020-09-05 00:37:13","title":"A Florida high school student was charged with a cyberattack that caused chaos during the first week of online classes","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/miami-student-accused-of-cyberattack-that-crashed-miami-schools-servers-2020-9","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f43bb6689aff80028ab76d2?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Zoom\" height=\"2131\" width=\"2841\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Getty</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>A high school student has been arrested and charged with a cyberattack that took down the servers of Miami-Dade County public schools this week, the school district said in a statement.</li>\n<li>The attack crashed the district's online learning platform and blocked students from logging on during their first week of online classes.</li>\n<li>A 16-year-old student admitted to carrying out a distributed denial-of-service attack, and the FBI is now investigating the incident, the district said.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>A 16-year-old student has been arrested and charged with orchestrating a cyberattack that crashed the Miami-Dade County Public Schools' online learning platform during the first week of classes, the school district <a href=\"http://news.dadeschools.net/cmnc/new/30657\">said</a> Thursday.</p><p>The district began its first day of online classes on Monday, with all students signing on remotely. But almost immediately, classes were disrupted when students encountered glitches that made it difficult to log on to the district's remote learning platform. Those issues stretched on for days, according to the Miami Palmetto Senior High <a href=\"https://www.thepalmettopanther.com/mdcps-virtual-reopening-hit-by-cyber-attacks/\">school paper</a>.</p><p>By Thursday, one student was arrested and admitted to orchestrating eight distributed denial-of-service, or DDoS, attacks that flooded the district networks and blocked students from logging in, the district said in a statement. The attacks ceased after the 16-year-old student was arrested, <a href=\"https://www.miamiherald.com/news/local/education/article245461020.html\">The Miami Herald</a> reported.</p><p>But Miami-Dade Schools Police said they believe other culprits committed separate cyberattacks against the district as well.</p><p>\"We believe, based upon our investigation, that other attackers are out there. We will not rest until every one of them is caught and brought to justice. ... Our message to anyone thinking of attempting a criminal act like this is to think twice. We will find you,\" MDSPD Chief Edwin Lopez said in a <a href=\"http://news.dadeschools.net/cmnc/new/30657\">statement</a>.</p><p>The episode illustrates one of the many unexpected challenges that schools are facing as they start fully-remote learning for the first time.</p><p>Districts typically rely on a single platform for their online learning, and when those platforms are compromised, classes are thrown into chaos. Schools across the US faced similar roadblocks last week, when both Zoom and the online-learning platform Canvas <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/canvas-down-instructure-outage-remote-learning-schools-2020-8\">crashed</a> amid a surge in users logging on for their first day of school.</p><p>The cyberattacks in Miami targeted <a href=\"https://www.k12.com/\">K12</a>, an online learning product that the school uses for remote classes. K12's data was not compromised in the attack, but the school district is now weighing whether to maintain its $15 million contract with K12, a spokesperson told <a href=\"https://www.miamiherald.com/news/local/education/article245434515.html\">The New York Times</a>.</p><p>DDoS attacks against school districts have spiked in the past year, according to a <a href=\"https://securelist.com/digital-education-the-cyberrisks-of-the-online-classroom/98380/\">report</a> published by cybersecurity firm Kaspersky on Friday. The firm noted a 350% increase in DDoS attacks against online educational resources between January and June compared to the same period last year, affecting more than than 168,000 users in 2020.&#160;</p><p><em><strong>Are you attending online classes or working remotely for the first time? Do you have a tip regarding your experience? Business Insider wants to hear from you. Contact this reporter at aholmes@businessinsider.com or 706-347-1880, or DM on Twitter at <a href=\"https://twitter.com/aaronpholmes\">@aaronpholmes</a>.</strong></em></p><div 00:37:13","updatedTime":"2020-09-05 00:37:13","title":"The stock market's big sell-off amounts to 'healthy' recalibration before heading even higher, says BlackRock's bond chief who oversees $2.3 trillion","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/stock-market-outlook-selloff-healthy-recalibration-higher-buy-portfolio-strategy-2020-9","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f524cefe6ff30001d4e716e?format=jpeg\" alt=\"2012 05 10T120000Z_638794941_GM1E85A15AP01_RTRMADP_3_USA.JPG\" height=\"873\" width=\"1747\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\"><a href=\"https://www.reutersconnect.com/all?id=tag%3Areuters.com%2C2012%3Anewsml_GM1E85A15AP01%3A638794941&#38;search=all%3Arick%20rieder\" target=\"_blank\">Steve Marcus/Reuters</a></p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul><li><strong>BlackRock's Rick Rieder told Bloomberg on Friday that the stock market's sell-off Thursday was a \"healthy\" recalibration.&#160;</strong></li><li><strong>He said the volume and price of call options leading up to the sell-off was \"bizarre,\" and the amount of froth in the market was more than he had seen in most of his career.</strong></li><li><strong>The global chief investment officer said investors should hold more equities and cash in their portfolios than they historically would have, and that traditional interest-rate sensitive assets don't do as much today.</strong></li></ul><ul><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestgest\"><strong>Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</strong></a><strong style=\"color: #222222;\">.</strong></li></ul><hr><p>Rick Rieder, BlackRock's global chief investment officer of fixed income, told Bloomberg on Friday that the stock market's sell-off on Thursday was a \"healthy\" recalibration, and he still believes stocks can go higher.&#160;</p><p>\"I think the market got ahead of itself and then recalibrated,\" Rieder said. \"The amount of exuberance particularly around some of those tech names was just overdone.\"&#160;</p><p>On Thursday the <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/index/nasdaq_100\">Nasdaq 100</a> dropped more than 5% during intraday trading, while the <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/index/s&p_500_500\">S&#38;P 500</a> fell roughly 4% in the biggest one-day declines since June. The investment chief said the amount of froth in the market leading up to the sell-off was larger than he had seen in most of his career, and the volume and price level of call options was \"bizarre\" and needed to recalibrate.<br><br>Rieder added that the question of whether a traditional 60-40 portfolio will suffice in a low-rate environment is the \"the most important question and issue today.\"&#160;</p><p><em><strong>Read more:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-a-russian-supermodel-became-an-angel-tech-investor-2020-8\" data-analytics-position=\"1\" data-analytics-module=\"\">How a Russian supermodel became an angel tech investor — and her advice for entrepreneurs trying to do the same</a></em></p><p>\"I still think the equity market is going to go higher. That being said, I do think you need to think about OK, how does your balance in your portfolio change because you can't count on Treasuries to rally alongside of a falling equity market?\" he said. <br><br>Rieder said investors should have more stocks and cash in their portfolios than they did historically, and added that BlackRock is running a \"barbell\" strategy.&#160;</p><p>\"Build some income in a portfolio, don't have so much what is traditional interest-rate sensitivity, because it's not going to do a lot for you today,\" Rieder said.&#160;</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the 00:37:13","updatedTime":"2020-09-05 00:37:13","title":"Amazon says it's hiring for 10,000 new jobs, and they aren't in its main Seattle headquarters","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/amazon-hiring-10000-jobs-workers-bellevue-washington-near-seattle-headquarters-2020-9","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f05eb79f0f4192f3f54e322?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Jeff Bezos\" height=\"3541\" width=\"5384\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Amazon&#39;s CEO Jeff Bezos speaks at an event in Washington.\n<p class=\"copyright\">REUTERS/Joshua Roberts</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Amazon is adding 10,000 new jobs to its planned Bellevue, Washington expansion.&#160;</li>\n<li>The retail giant said Friday its new leases on two buildiings there will now total 25,000 positions.&#160;</li>\n<li>Earlier this year, the company lost a fierce fight against a new tax imposed by the Seattle City Council on large companies.&#160;</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>&#160;</p><p>Amazon appears to be following through on reports it plans to shift its footprint out of Seattle.</p><p>The company on Friday said it plans to hire an additional 10,000 workers in Bellevue, Washington on top of the 15,000 jobs it promised last year. It's also leasing two new offices near a planned transit extension in the suburb's downtown to accommodate the workers.</p><p>\"These projects will provide our teams with state-of-the-art office space, and the community with new amenities — such as public parks and retail space — to help fulfill the city's vision of a thriving, connected, and pedestrian-friendly business district,\" John Schoettler, Amazon's VP of real estate, <a href=\"https://blog.aboutamazon.com/job-creation-and-investment/bringing-additional-jobs-to-bellevue\">said in a press release.</a></p><p>In August, <a href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-08-14/amazon-considers-relocating-some-employees-out-of-seattle?sref=LspfQlRv\">Bloomberg News reported</a> that the retail giant was considering relocating some employees out of Seattle, citing an internal poll about \"office workplace options.\" It's unclear if Friday's announcement is related to those plans. For years, Amazon's been growing other offices outside Seattle, including New York, Los Angeles, and the Washington D.C. area.</p><p>Regardless of the timing, the announcement comes as political tides in Seattle shift against Amazon. In July, the City Council <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/seattle-city-council-approves-new-tax-on-big-business-2020-7\">approved a new tax on large businesses</a> after Amazon fought voraciously against it. The new law's expected to raise some $200 million every year for the city's coffers by taxing companies whose payrolls exceed $7 million.</p><p>Amazon had 798,000 full-time employees as of <a href=\"http://d18rn0p25nwr6d.cloudfront.net/CIK-0001018724/4d39f579-19d8-4119-b087-ee618abf82d6.pdf\">its most recent annual report</a>, and executives said in July that its headcount has increased by another 175,000 this year as the company responds to an uptick in demand during the COVID-19 pandemic.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a 00:37:13","updatedTime":"2020-09-05 00:37:13","title":"The best Wi-Fi systems for heavy use on multiple devices","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-wi-fi-systems-heavy-use","description":"<p class=\"financial-disclaimer\"><i>When you buy through our links, we may earn money from our affiliate partners. <a href=\"https://www.insider-inc.com/commerce-on-insider-inc/\">Learn more.</a></i></p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f5155fee6ff30001d4e6fb2?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Best wifi mesh for multiple devices\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li><strong>Many folks at home with many connected devices puts extra strain on your home networking equipment.</strong></li><li><strong>We've picked out the best Wi-Fi systems to handle many users and heavy traffic.</strong></li><li><strong>Our recommendations range from speedy, single routers to extensive mesh network systems.</strong></li><li><strong>Read more: <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-work-from-home-tech\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Tech gadgets to boost productivity and comfort working from home.</a></strong></li></ul><p>We're all spending a lot of time at home, and that may also include having more family members in the household at one time. If everyone in the house is trying to get online for work, online classes, the latest Netflix binge, or a Zoom marathon at the same time, that can put some serious strain on your network. Some hardware can handle it, but a lot can't.</p><p>If you're trying to get a Wi-Fi system that can keep up, there are more than a few on the market that'll do the job. As long as you've got a home internet plan that has the bandwidth, a simple change of routers in your home can fix the slowdowns you might be experiencing.<strong>&#160;</strong></p><p>We've picked out well-received products that have specs and features that make them solidly suited to the demands of many devices and heavy use. For big homes, that may mean mesh Wi-Fi systems that feature many nodes. For close quarters, that may be the latest Wi-Fi 6 router with a quad-core processor inside.</p><h3>We'll guide you through our selections, highlighting the features that make each a standout device to support your home network.</h3>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tAsus ZenWiFi AX 66000 XT8\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f51466ee6ff30001d4e6f4e?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Asus wifi\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>If you have a lot of square footage to cover and a ton of devices, <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/dp/B081ZVFN64/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;linkCode=ll1&#38;tag=biipgf_090320_best-wi-fi-systems-heavy-use-20&#38;linkId=0230ded2b786f6e13c86bb6c5a6d8a02&#38;language=en_US\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Asus's ZenWiFi AX XT8 system</a> can sort it out.&#160;</h3><p>This Wi-Fi 6 system includes two units to cover up to 5,500 square feet. As this is a tri-band router, it can dedicate a link between the two units ensuring high speeds for your devices regardless of which unit they connect to. And, it still leaves you 2.4GHz and 5GHz bands to set up your other devices on. Spreading out your Wi-Fi connections between the two units and separate bands will help fight that network congestion. This router scored a top rating from <a href=\"https://www.techradar.com/reviews/asus-zenwifi-ax-xt8\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">TechRadar</a>, not to mention high ratings from <a href=\"https://www.cnet.com/reviews/asus-zenwifi-ax-review/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">CNET</a> and <a href=\"https://www.pcmag.com/reviews/asus-zenwifi-ax-xt8\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">PC Gamer</a>.</p><div id=\"ProductCard_5f51444e254f8a008f640f68\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5f51444e254f8a008f640f68&type=button&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div>\n\t\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f514786e6ff30001d4e6f5a?format=jpeg\" alt=\"TP Link \" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/TP-Link-AC4000-Smart-WiFi-Router/dp/B084HLB7LJ/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;linkCode=ll1&#38;tag=biipgf_090320_best-wi-fi-systems-heavy-use-20&#38;linkId=3ecdd9f45dec0813c5adf393aaaaa401&#38;language=en_US\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">TP-Link's Archer A20 router</a> is a powerhouse for the WiFi 5 era. If you don't have a lot of Wi-Fi 6 devices yet, this router is a solid bet.&#160;</h3><p>The Archer A20 offers a tri-band connection, letting you use the 2.4GHz band for many devices with slower networking needs while reserving two 5GHz bands that you can dedicate to devices that need the 1,625Mbps speed they can offer. You can even set aside one of the 5GHz bands for a single device, so you won't have to worry about other devices slowing down important meetings or classes. There's a good reason this router has earned <a href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/wirecutter/reviews/best-wi-fi-router/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Wirecutter's</a> top ranking for routers.</p><div id=\"ProductCard_5f514778abc2a8002f716fda\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5f514778abc2a8002f716fda&type=button&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div>\n\tNetgear Orbi RBK852\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f515225e6ff30001d4e6f9e?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Orbi Ax600\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Best Buy</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>Netgear's Orbi mesh Wi-Fi system is a strong option. You can kit yourself out with two or three units to start and add on even more units if you need extra coverage.</h3><p>The main unit has a 2.5-Gigabit WAN port to let you take full advantage of your ISP's connection, and it links to satellite units over a dedicated 5GHz backhaul with 2,400Mbps speeds. That leaves another 5GHz band open to deliver those same speeds to your devices. Each unit packs a 2.2GHz, quad-core processor to speedily handle data transmission, and the whole system uses Wi-Fi 6 to offer extra-fast connections on support devices. With all that power, it's no wonder <a href=\"https://www.forbes.com/sites/gordonkelly/2020/04/26/netgear-orbi-wifi-6-ax6000-rbk852-review-best-mesh-router-recommended-office-home-wifi/#2a70ca131bbc\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Forbes</a> has called it the best mesh router.</p><div id=\"ProductCard_5f5149bf253b70016c675af8\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5f5149bf253b70016c675af8&type=button&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div>\n\tEero Pro with beacons\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f5153597ed0ee001e25d61c?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Eero Pro\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>If you're all about the wireless connections and don't think you'll need many wired links, the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/eero-Home-WiFi-System-Beacon/dp/B0713ZCT4N/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;linkCode=ll1&#38;tag=biipgf_090320_best-wi-fi-systems-heavy-use-20&#38;linkId=1fd1e2bca1e9d215b7571d198c97749b&#38;language=en_US\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Eero Pro</a> and its beacons offer a stealthy way to blanket your home in Wi-Fi.</h3><p>The setup includes one base station and two beacons, and won't have you fussing around with many wires to install. The beacons plug directly into your wall outlets, and the main unit is smaller than many standalone routers you'll find. The main unit does offer one LAN port, at least, so you can wire up a TV or other high-bandwidth device to take that load off the Wi-Fi network. This setup has earned high marks from <a href=\"https://www.androidcentral.com/eero-pro-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Android Central</a>, and it's <a href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/wirecutter/reviews/best-wi-fi-mesh-networking-kits/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Wirecutter's</a> top mesh router pick.</p><div id=\"ProductCard_5d261d30a17d6c13175bdbd7\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5d261d30a17d6c13175bdbd7&type=button&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div>\n\tAsus RT-AX88U\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f5155a7e6ff30001d4e6fb1?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Asus router\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>It may not have a pretty name, but the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/RT-AX88U-Dual-Band-Aiprotection-Lifetime-Compatible/dp/B07HM6KJN8/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;linkCode=ll1&#38;tag=biipgf_090320_best-wi-fi-systems-heavy-use-20&#38;linkId=d7a3a723e7138948516b4ab024ae0181&#38;language=en_US\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Asus RT-AX88U</a> is a fast router with a design that says as much.&#160;</h3><p>This Asus router offers Wi-Fi 6 to deliver better handling of wireless connections on supported devices. The router features eight LAN ports, so you can wire up some devices to take some strain off your wireless network from things like your TV or video game consoles. And, if you need to expand the network to cover more of your home, you can link this router with some of Asus's other models using the AiMesh feature. This router has earned high praise from <a href=\"https://www.pcgamer.com/asus-rt-ax88u-gaming-router-review/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">PC Gamer</a> and former CNET reviewer Dong Ngo of <a href=\"https://dongknows.com/asus-rt-ax88u-review/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Dong Knows</a>.</p><div id=\"ProductCard_5f51559b8fc39703df5db6d8\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5f51559b8fc39703df5db6d8&type=button&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" 80@2020_4/2020/09/04/16-37-51-857_a32750a34db794f5.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1599237433611},{"createdTime":"2020-09-05 00:37:13","updatedTime":"2020-09-05 00:37:13","title":"'Mulan' is now available on Disney Plus — here's how to watch the 'Premier Access' movie at home","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-watch-mulan-movie","description":"<p class=\"financial-disclaimer\"><i>When you buy through our links, we may earn money from our affiliate partners. <a href=\"https://www.insider-inc.com/commerce-on-insider-inc/\">Learn more.</a></i></p><p><a href=\"https://disneyplus.bn5x.net/c/196318/564546/9358?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.disneyplus.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f2c0fef988ee35dd9597605?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Mulan Disney Plus\" height=\"882\" width=\"1176\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">IMDB</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></a></p><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li>\"Mulan\" is now available on <a href=\"https://disneyplus.bn5x.net/c/196318/564546/9358?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.disneyplus.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Disney Plus</a>, six months after forgoing its planned theatrical release in the United States due to the coronavirus pandemic.</li><li>\"Mulan\" costs $29.99 to watch in addition to the <a href=\"https://disneyplus.bn5x.net/c/196318/564546/9358?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.disneyplus.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Disney Plus</a> subscription fee, which is $6.99 per month or $69.99 per year.&#160;</li><li>Once purchased, \"Mulan\" will <a href=\"https://www.insider.com/mulan-purchase-on-disney-wont-be-one-time-rental-2020-8\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">remain unlocked to watch on Disney Plus</a> for as long as you remain a subscriber.</li><li>All Disney Plus subscribers will be able to watch \"Mulan\" with their standard subscription starting December 4, three months after the \"Premier Access\"&#160;release.</li><li>For detailed impressions on Disney Plus, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/disney-plus-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">check out our Disney Plus review here</a>.</li></ul><div id=\"ProductCard_5dc5bb627eece5443d2df8b9\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5dc5bb627eece5443d2df8b9&type=small&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><div id=\"ProductCard_5e38a0505bc79c55442b3598\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5e38a0505bc79c55442b3598&type=small&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><p>Disney's \"Mulan,\" a live-action reimagining of the Chinese folk hero, is now available on <a href=\"https://disneyplus.bn5x.net/c/196318/564546/9358?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.disneyplus.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Disney Plus</a>&#160;as the platform's first \"<a href=\"https://disneyplus.bn5x.net/c/196318/564546/9358?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.disneyplus.com%2Fwelcome%2Fnew\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Premier Access</a>\" title, with a $30 fee to watch. \"Mulan\" will become available to all Disney Plus subscribers on December 4.</p><p>The latest trailer for the film showcases significant departures from the animated \"Mulan\" released in 1998, including a new witch character named Xian Lang and choreographed action scenes that exceed the imagination of the original film.</p><iframe width=\"560\" height=\"315\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/bJbAZh3fv0g\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen></iframe><p>While 1998's \"Mulan\" was a family comedy with musical numbers and comedic characters, like the talking dragon Mushu voiced by Eddie Murphy, the new film is rated PG-13 and strikes a more serious tone. Also, unlike Disney's recent live-action remakes of \"Aladdin\" and \"The Lion King,\" the new \"Mulan\" doesn't feature any musical performances from the cast.</p><p>The new film doesn't adopt the songs and musical stylings of the original, but the soundtrack does feature a new version of the song \"Reflection\" updated by the original artist, Christina Aguilera. \"Reflection\" was one of the first singles of Aguilera's career, and she's produced another song called \"Loyal Brave True\" for the new film's soundtrack as well.</p><iframe width=\"560\" height=\"315\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Qo8gX1Evay8\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen></iframe><p>\"Mulan\" was originally intended for a theatrical release and even had a Hollywood premiere event in March before the coronavirus pandemic forced theaters around the world to close. Now, the film led by Liu Yifei, Donnie Yen and Jet Li will be available online via <a href=\"https://disneyplus.bn5x.net/c/196318/564546/9358?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.disneyplus.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Disney Plus</a>, while countries where theaters have re-opened will still have the option for a theatrical release.</p><p>\"Mulan\" isn't the first Disney movie to find its way to Disney Plus after COVID-19 caused theaters across the United States to close, but it's the first to require an additional payment beyond the subscription fee. <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/pixar-movies-on-disney-plus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Pixar's \"Onward\"</a> was also fast-tracked to Disney Plus in March after its theater run was cut short by the coronavirus. <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-watch-artemis-fowl\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\"Artemis Fowl\"</a> was scheduled to hit theaters in May but premiered on Disney Plus in June with disappointing reviews.</p><p>Marvel's \"Black Widow\" was due out in May but Disney has yet to reveal its plans for Scarlett Johansson's superhero film.&#160;<a href=\"https://variety.com/2020/tv/news/disney-plus-60-5-million-paid-subscribers-1234725409/\">According to Variety,</a> Disney CEO Bob Chapek said the release of \"Mulan\" on Disney Plus is a special situation, rather than the company adopting a new business model.&#160;</p><p><em>Updated on 9/4/2020 by Kevin Webb: The language in this article has been updated to coincide with the release of \"Mulan\" on Disney Plus.</em></p><h2>How to watch 'Mulan' on Disney Plus</h2><p>\"Mulan\" is available now on Disney Plus. To watch, you'll need a monthly or annual <a href=\"https://disneyplus.bn5x.net/c/196318/564546/9358?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.disneyplus.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Disney Plus subscription</a>&#160;and you'll have to pay the $29.99 \"Premier Access\" fee. With that said, \"Mulan\" is <a href=\"https://www.insider.com/mulan-purchase-on-disney-wont-be-one-time-rental-2020-8\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">not a one-time rental</a>. Instead, once purchased, Disney Plus members will continue to have access to \"Mulan\" for as long as they remain a subscriber.</p><p>The Premier Access purchase option will be available through November 2. \"Mulan\" will then be available to stream for all Disney Plus subscribers without an extra fee starting December 4. Streaming via <a href=\"https://disneyplus.bn5x.net/c/196318/564546/9358?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.disneyplus.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Disney Plus</a> will be the only way to watch \"Mulan\" since it wont be released in theaters in the United States and it's not yet available on Blu-ray.&#160;&#160;</p><p>If you're interested in watching Disney's earlier interpretation of the Mulan story, the animated version of \"Mulan\" is already available on Disney Plus for all subscribers.</p><h2><strong>What is Disney Plus and how does it work?</strong></h2><p><a href=\"https://disneyplus.bn5x.net/c/196318/564546/9358?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.disneyplus.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Disney Plus</a> is a subscription streaming platform with on-demand access to Disney's iconic library of movies and TV shows. Along with \"Mulan,\" \"Toy Story 4,\" \"Frozen 2\"&#160; and Disney's other latest theater releases, you'll find classic franchises like <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/star-wars-disney-plus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\"Star Wars,\"</a> \"The Simpsons\" and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/marvel-disney-plus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Marvel's \"Avengers.\"</a></p><p>A monthly subscription costs $6.99 per month while an annual subscription gives a small discount at $69.99 per year. Those looking for additional streaming content can sign up for a <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/disney-plus-bundle\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">bundle with Disney Plus, ESPN+ and Hulu</a>. The bundle costs $12.99 per month, which is about $5 less per month than it would cost to subscribe to each service separately.</p><p><a href=\"https://disneyplus.bn5x.net/c/196318/564546/9358?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.disneyplus.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Disney Plus</a> is available to stream on Apple, PC, iOS, and Android devices, Xbox One and PlayStation 4, and streaming devices from Amazon, Roku, and Chromecast. Disney Plus is also supported on smart TVs, including those from Samsung, LG, Sony, and Vizio. An internet connection is necessary to stream, but Disney Plus does provide an option to <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/disney-plus-app\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">download movies</a> and shows for offline viewing</p><p>All Disney Plus subscriptions include ad-free streaming and unlimited downloads for a growing library of films and TV series. Disney Plus supports up to 4K resolution video on select titles, as well as <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-is-hdr-tv\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Dolby Vision HDR</a> and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-is-dolby-atmos\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Dolby Atmos audio</a> with applicable devices.&#160;</p><h2>What other brand-new movies can I rent at home?</h2><p>Disney isn't the only movie studio to make its planned theatrical releases available on streaming services. Universal Studios debuted <a href=\"https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=35871X943606&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.vudu.com%2Fcontent%2Fmovies%2Fdetails%2FTrolls-World-Tour%2F1398601&xcust=1596724177206au1caup87|xid:fr1596724181289iej81289iej\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">\"Trolls World Tour\"</a> as premium rental on multiple services for $20. Following the film's success, Universal announced a new deal to bring future theatrical releases to streaming services less than a month after they reach theaters.</p><p>At $29.99, \"Mulan\" will cost $10 more than \"Trolls World Tour\" before including the cost of a Disney Plus subscription. During the company's most recent earnings report Disney announced that Disney Plus now has more than 60 million subscribers worldwide. However, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/disney-plus-60-million-subscribers-arpu-lagging-netflix-hulu-2020-8\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Disney Plus isn't earning nearly as much money per subscriber as Netflix,</a> its top competitor, and the company has suffered <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/coronavirus-impact-on-disney-parks-finances-balance-sheet-florida-2020-7\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">heavy losses in its live entertainment and theme park business due to the pandemic.</a></p><p>Other studios, like Sony, Lionsgate, Paramount, and Warner Brothers, have also been offering streaming rental or purchase options for select titles that were originally planned for theaters. \"In-theater\" digital rentals or purchases can be made through a variety of services, including <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/video/storefront/?&_encoding=UTF8&tag=biipf_042420_how-to-rent-streaming-movies-20&linkCode=ur2&linkId=2ab9e4b66c33435d32d1bea75f73264f&camp=1789&creative=9325p=1789&#38;creative=9325\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"40\" data-amzn-asin=\"storefront\" data-ml-dynamic=\"true\" data-ml-dynamic-type=\"sl\" data-orig-url=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/video/storefront/?&_encoding=UTF8&tag=biipf_042420_how-to-rent-streaming-movies-20&linkCode=ur2&linkId=2ab9e4b66c33435d32d1bea75f73264f&camp=1789&creative=9325p=1789&#38;creative=9325\" data-ml-id=\"19\" data-ml=\"true\" data-xid=\"fr1596723821964aii\" data-skimlinks-tracking=\"xid:fr1596723821964aii\">Amazon Prime Video</a>,&#160;<a href=\"https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=35871X943606&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.apple.com%2Fapple-tv-app%2F&xcust=1596723818464a0vui448s|xid:fr1596723821964ccf21964ccf\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"40\" data-orig-url=\"https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=35871X943606&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.apple.com%2Fapple-tv-app%2F&xcust=1596723818464a0vui448s0vui448s\" data-ml-id=\"20\" data-ml=\"true\" data-xid=\"fr1596723821964ccf\">Apple TV</a>,&#160;<a href=\"https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=35871X943606&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.vudu.com%2Fcontent%2Fmovies%2Fuxrow%2FTheater-At-Home-Premium-Early-%2F5558&xcust=1596723818464avxaxpd2n|xid:fr1596723821964fhe21964fhe\" Berlin: Elon Musk (l), CEO of Tesla, and Herbert Diess, Chairman of the Board of Management of Volkswagen, converse after the presentation of the Golden Steering Wheel.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jörg Carstensen/picture alliance via Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Tesla CEO Elon Musk <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/musk-promises-tesla-design-overhaul-ravecave-at-berlin-plant-2020-9\">was in Germany this week.</a></li>\n<li>He toured the company's under-construction factory and met with Volkswagen's chairman Herbert Diess.&#160;</li>\n<li>The billionaire also test-drove VW's competing electric vehicle, the ID.3, sources told Reuters.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>&#160;</p><p>Tesla Chief Executive Elon&#160;Musk&#160;met Volkswagen's Chief Executive Herbert Diess for a courtesy visit during which&#160;Musk&#160;took a test drive in Volkswagen's new electric car, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters on Friday.</p><p>According to <a href=\"https://www.handelsblatt.com/technik/forschung-innovation/stippvisite-tesla-chef-musk-trifft-vw-chef-diess-und-testet-den-id-3-/26158876.html?ticket=ST-8761578-IDwfWAjZ1A4LUS17ocws-ap1\">local media</a>, whose reports were confirmed by <a href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-09-04/musk-test-drives-vw-electric-car-in-meeting-with-ceo-diess?sref=LspfQlRv\">Bloomberg</a> and Reuters, Musk flew to Braunschweig airport near Volkswagen's headquarters in Wolfsburg <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/musk-promises-tesla-design-overhaul-ravecave-at-berlin-plant-2020-9\">after departing Berlin</a>. There, he test-drove the company's ID.3 electric-car during the two-hour meeting with chairman Herbert Diess.</p><p>A spokeswoman for Volkswagen declined to comment on the meeting. A spokeswoman for Tesla could not be reached for comment. Musk was also scheduled to meet with Germany's economic minister Peter Altmaier.&#160;&#160;</p><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet blockquote\" data-lang=\"en\" data-cards=\"\" data-conversation=\"\">&#8212;Volkswagen Group  (@VWGroup) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/1301878864520589312?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">September 4, 2020</a></blockquote><script async src=\"//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script><p>&#160;</p><p>Diess<a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/news/stocks/tesla-stock-price-jumps-after-volkswagen-ceo-reported-investment-interest-2019-8-1028466475\"> has long been outspoken in his praise of Musk</a>.</p><p>\"Elon Musk delivers results that many did not think possible,\" he&#160;<a href=\"https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:6691816206233567232?commentUrn=urn%3Ali%3Acomment%3A%28activity%3A6691816206233567232%2C6692014689779490816%29\">said on Linkedin</a> in July. \"They show: you can be profitable with electric cars. As one of few car manufacturers (Porsche AG also, for example),&#160;Tesla&#160;will drive through the corona crisis without a quarter of losses.\"</p><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet blockquote\" data-lang=\"en\" data-cards=\"\" data-conversation=\"\">&#8212;Elon Musk  (@elonmusk) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/1301647642846547971?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">September 3, 2020</a></blockquote><script async src=\"//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script><p>&#160;</p><p>At Tesla's under-construction factory, Musk said Tesla plans to manufacture batteries there for its vehicles.</p><p>\"It will be the first time that there will be a transformation in the core structural design of the vehicle. It's quite a big thing. Both manufacturing, engineering and design as well,\" <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/musk-promises-tesla-design-overhaul-ravecave-at-berlin-plant-2020-9\">he said, according to video from the event.</a> \"The three elements needed for a sustainable energy future are sustainable energy generation, energy storage, and sustainable transport, electric cars.\"</p><div
